relevant_findings.HEENT: NC/AT, PERRLA, EOMI, sclerae anicteric, dry mucous membranes, OP clear
relevant_findings.heart: PMI non-displaced, RRR, systolic murmur, audible mechanical valve
relevant_findings.lungs: CTAB, no r/rh/wh, good air movement, resp unlabored, no accessory muscle use
